content.p: The Online Store service offers University departments the facility to take online payments and bookings. Online Store card payment pages can cater for everything from simple payments for physical items like clothing and mugs, to document ordering, admin fees and field trips, as well as more specialised setups for conference and event bookings and short courses. Any process where departments need to take payment and/or capture booking or registration details can be setup to run automatically using this service, sending the money to a designated project code with all the information available via excel friendly online reports. To find out how you can arrange a payment page in the Online Store please email us. store@nottingham.ac.uk E Payment Services, Room B06 Portland Building, University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD store.nottingham.ac.uk email list: Please see our contacts page
